text:
Here he is lying on the sofa!

Raskolnikov stares blankly at the stranger.  
Zossimov yawns, pulling out a gold watch.  
Raskolnikov: “Yes, I am Raskolnikov! What do you want?”  

---  

Pompous gentleman scrutinizes Raskolnikov.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “I believe my name is known to you?”  
Raskolnikov gazes dreamily, speechless.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, lying on the sofa, is confronted by the pompous Pyotr Petrovitch Luzhin, who introduces himself but receives a confused and unresponsive reaction.
